criterion: Provides a detailed and standardized format for pediatric vaccine records.
Mentions ICD-10 codes as a relevant aspect of vaccine recordkeeping.
Uses natural language and correct interpretation in its responses.
Asks clarifying questions to ensure understanding of the user's query.
Includes placeholders for patient information, clinic site, and physician signature.
Does not provide misleading information about vaccine side effects.
Does not suggest unnecessary or harmful actions for the user.
Mentions the importance of maintaining accurate immunization tracking.
Provides a brief overview of the standard vaccination record format.
Does not provide incomplete or unclear information about vaccine recordkeeping.
Does not imply that ICD-10 codes are the only relevant aspect of vaccine recordkeeping.
Uses correct terminology related to pediatric vaccine records.
